dcterms:creator: T. T. Ng
S. F. Chang
Q. Sun
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 1845 image blocks, out of which 933 are authentic (AU), and 912 are spliced (SP). The image blocks are grayscale, retrieved from 322 photos, and created using simple cut-paste operations without any post-processing.
dcterms:title: Columbia Gray

dcterms:creator: Y. F. Hsu
S. F. Chang
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses the shortcomings of the Columbia Gray dataset, containing 363 color images, with 183 authentic and 180 spliced images. The images are in TIFF format and include edge masks for spliced object boundaries.
dcterms:title: Columbia Color

dcterms:creator: J. Dong
W. Wang
T. Tan
dcterms:description: The CASIA 1.0 dataset consists of 1725 images, with 800 authentic and 925 spliced images, all in JPG format. The spliced images are created using Adobe Photoshop by performing copy and paste operations.
dcterms:title: CASIA 1.0

dcterms:creator: J. Dong
W. Wang
T. Tan
dcterms:description: The CASIA 2.0 dataset contains 12614 images, with 7491 authentic and 5123 forged images. It includes both copy-move and image splicing images, with various image formats and dimensions.
dcterms:title: CASIA 2.0

dcterms:creator: T. J. D. Carvalho
C. Riess
E. Angelopoulou
H. Pedrini
A. d. R. Rocha
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 200 images, with 100 authentic and 100 spliced images, including indoor and outdoor images. The spliced images are created by adding one or two people to the authentic images.
dcterms:title: DSO-1

dcterms:creator: T. J. D. Carvalho
C. Riess
E. Angelopoulou
H. Pedrini
A. d. R. Rocha
dcterms:description: This dataset comprises 50 images, with 25 authentic and 25 spliced images of different dimensions, constructed from popular image splicing categories acquired from the Internet.
dcterms:title: DSI-1

dcterms:creator: M. Zampoglou
S. Papadopoulos
Y. Kompatsiaris
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 9666 spliced images gathered from the Internet, created from 82 categories. The images are in various formats and have undergone post-processing operations.
dcterms:title: WildWeb

dcterms:creator: A. L. Gokhale
S. D. Thepade
N. R. Aarons
D. Pramod
R. Kulkarni
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 93 images, with 45 authentic and 48 spliced images. The images are in JPG format and include ground truth masks for the spliced images.
dcterms:title: AbhAS

dcterms:description: The MISD dataset consists of 918 images, with 618 authentic images and 300 multiple spliced images. The authentic images are taken from the CASIA 1.0 dataset, and the spliced images are created using various image editing operations.
dcterms:title: MISD (Multiple Image Splicing Dataset)
